/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is flanked by lush greenery and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The buildings, painted in shades of gray and white, rise majestically against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is captured from a low angle, adding a sense of grandeur to the buildings and the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the greenery providing a refreshing contrast to the gray and white buildings.
